effect.diamond-pearl: Inflicts regular damage. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
effect.platinum: Inflicts regular damage. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
effect.heartgold-soulsilver: Inflicts regular damage. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

short_effect.diamond-pearl: Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
short_effect.platinum: Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
flavor_text.platinum: A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
